text: is a Japanese footballer who plays for Tokushima Vortis. He is a defender. ==Career== He was educated at and played for Osaka University of Health and Sport sciences before moving to Singapore in 2017.http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/21691/ He is currently playing for J2 League, Ventforet Kofu. ==Club career statistics== As of end of 2018 season.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 157 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
